item.title: Risk of Antibiotics (Risk of Allergies)
item.description: hypersensitive reactions Giving antibiotics to babies may increase their threat for developing hypersensitive reactions, a new take a look at suggests.

item.title: what is BARBER'S ITCH, or sycosis barbae,
item.description: BARBER'S ITCH, or sycosis barbae, is the name applied to a troublesome condi-tion which affects the beard area in men.
